衝.definition: powerful; vigorous; pungent; towards; in view of

衝入.definition: to rush into; to break into

衝刺.definition: (sports) to sprint; to spurt; to dash; to put in a big effort to achieve a goal as the deadline approaches

衝力.definition: momentum (the force exhibited by a moving body); (fig.) momentum (capacity for progressive development)

衝動.definition: to have an urge; to be impetuous; impulse; urge

衝垮.definition: to burst; to break through; to topple

衝壓.definition: to stamp; to press (sheet metal); Taiwan pr. [chong1ya1]

衝打.definition: (of waves, rain etc) to dash against; to batter

衝撞.definition: to collide; jerking motion; to impinge; to offend; to provoke

衝擊.definition: to attack; to batter; (of waves) to pound against; shock; impact

衝昏頭腦.definition: lit. to be muddled in the brain (idiom); fig. excited and unable to act rationally; to go to one's head

衝破.definition: breakthrough; to overcome an obstacle quickly

衝突.definition: conflict; to conflict; clash of opposing forces; collision (of interests); contention

衝進.definition: to rush in; to charge in

衝鋒陷陣.definition: to charge and break through enemy lines
